A '''bordure indented banner pattern''' is a [[banner pattern]] used to customize [[banner]]s with a shape of a fancy border.

== Obtaining ==
=== Crafting ===

{{Crafting
|Paper
|Vines
|Output=Bordure Indented Banner Pattern
|type=Miscellaneous
}}

== Usage ==
=== Loom ingredient ===
Bordure indented banner patterns are used in [[loom]]s to add customization to [[banner]]s. The pattern must be combined with 1 banner and 1 [[dye]]. Upon usage in the loom, the bordure indented banner pattern is not consumed.

{{Looming
|showdescription=1
|ingredients={{:Banner/recipe|ingredients}}
|{{:Banner/recipe|banner}}
|Matching Dye
|Bordure Indented Banner Pattern
|Bordure Indented
|{{:Banner/recipe|output|Bordure Indented}}
|Blink=Banner
|Olink=Banner
|description=Emblazons a bordure indented (fancy border)
}}
